author: Canadian Press
title: Truck carrying girders slams into Highway 99 overpass, halting traffic
text:
DELTA — A truck carrying what appears to be heavy construction material has smashed into an overpass in Delta, British Columbia, shutting down the southbound lanes of Highway 99.
It's the latest in a rash of overpass collisions that prompted the province to announce harsher penalties for companies and drivers with repeat offences earlier this month.
Drive BC says the incident south of Vancouver has also blocked traffic in both directions on the 112th Street overpass.
Delta Fire and Rescue Deputy Chief Dave Wood says the crash caused a "secondary accident" involving another vehicle.
He says crews were called to the scene at 12:14 p.m. and he didn't know of any injuries.
Photos of the aftermath of the incident posted on social media show large girders on the bed of a truck with another laying across the highway along with other debris.
Provincial statistics say as many as 30 bridge strikes have happened on British Columbia's highways since 2021, with 16 of them reported last year alone.
The new rules, announced Dec. 14, include the requirement for dump-style vehicles to have in-cab warning devices by next June, telling drivers if their trailer hasn't been lowered.
Over-height vehicle fines will increase to $575, up from $115.
This report by The Canadian Press was first published Dec. 28, 2023.
The Canadian Press

author: 東方日報 OrientalDaily
title: 2024 Met Gala 全紅毯：Jennie、Nicole Kidman、Elle Fanning ...誰美到讓鎂光燈閃不停？
text:
Popbee 2024 Met Gala 全紅毯：Jennie、Nicole Kidman、Elle Fanning ...誰美到讓鎂光燈閃不停？ 閱讀整篇文章 Popbee 更新日期： 2024年5月7日 上午7:45
View this post on Instagram
A post shared by POPBEE (@popbee)
Met Gala 有著「時尚奧斯卡」盛事之稱 ，每一年眾星雲集的紅毯最是奪人眼球的一大看點，繼 2023 年「Karl Lagerfeld：A Line of Beauty」致敬老佛爺 Karl Lagerfeld 作為主題後，《VOGUE》也宣布今年的著裝要求：「The Garden Of Time」，與春季展「Sleeping Beauties： Reawakening Fashion」，而紅毯終於在稍早正式登場，今年可以說是巨星齊聚，Popbee 就來帶大家一起來看美到翻天的 Met Gala 紅毯！
View this post on Instagram
A post shared by POPBEE (@popbee)
今年同樣選址在 The Metropolitan Museum of Art 紐約大都會藝術博物館，Met Gala 2024 盛大在港台時間早上六點登場，本屆的著裝要求以「The Garden Of Time」作為主題，名人們將透過對 3D 花卉裝飾到引人注目的色彩等各種元素來帶出個人風格，令粉絲們都相當期待看到大家將如何對自然世界來致敬，而今回 Popbee 一次帶時尚迷來看 BLACKPINK Jennie、Nicole Kidman、Zendaya 、 DUA LIPA…等人究竟有多令人驚艷？

author: Mathew Davis
title: 10 Benefits of Animal-Assisted Therapy for Elderly Individuals
text: Help keep One Green Planet free and independent! Together we can ensure our platform remains a hub for empowering ideas committed to fighting for a sustainable, healthy, and compassionate world. Please support us in keeping our mission strong. Animal-assisted therapy has gained recognition as a valuable intervention for improving the overall well-being of elderly individuals. The presence of animals, whether through direct interaction or companionship, offers a range of benefits that positively impact their physical, emotional, and social health. This article explores ten key advantages of [animal-assisted therapy](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/animals/the-healing-power-10-benefits-of-animal-assisted-therapy-for-children-with-autism/) for seniors, shedding light on the transformative power of these unique and meaningful connections. 1. Reduced Feelings of Loneliness and Isolation – Interacting with animals can alleviate feelings of loneliness and isolation commonly experienced by elderly individuals. – Animals provide companionship and unconditional love, creating a sense of connection and reducing [social isolation](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/natural-health/social-frailty-empowering-older-adults-through-connection-and-support/). 2. Improved Mental Health – Animal-assisted therapy has been shown to reduce symptoms of depression, [anxiety](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/natural-health/how-cashews-can-help-with-stress-and-anxiety/), and stress in elderly individuals. – The presence of animals can promote feelings of happiness, relaxation, and a sense of purpose, enhancing overall mental well-being. 3. Enhanced Cognitive Function – Interacting with animals stimulates cognitive functions in elderly individuals, improving [memory](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/news/study-shows-rats-showcase-unprecedented-memory-recall-abilities/), attention, and problem-solving skills. – Engaging in activities such as training or caring for animals can help maintain cognitive abilities and prevent cognitive decline. 4. Increased Physical Activity – Animal-assisted therapy encourages elderly individuals to engage in physical activities such as walking, playing, or [grooming](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/news/5-dog-grooming-scares/) animals. – Regular physical activity improves cardiovascular health, strengthens muscles, and enhances overall physical well-being. 5. Lowered Blood Pressure and Heart Rate – The presence of animals has been shown to reduce [blood pressure](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/natural-health/10-super-plants-herbs-to-naturally-reduce-blood-pressure-and-hypertension/) and heart rate in elderly individuals. – Petting or stroking animals releases endorphins, promoting relaxation and stress reduction, leading to improved cardiovascular health. 6. Enhanced Socialization and Communication – Animals act as social catalysts, facilitating social interactions and conversations among [elderly](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/news/elderly-cat-adopts-woman-moves-in/) individuals. – Pets can serve as icebreakers, encouraging conversation and enabling seniors to connect with others, including caregivers, family, and peers. 7. Increased Sense of Purpose and Responsibility – Caring for animals provides elderly individuals with a sense of purpose, responsibility, and routine. – [Feeding](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/news/wildlife-center-staff-wears-fox-masks-while-feeding-cubs/), grooming, and training animals instill a sense of accomplishment and self-worth, promoting a positive outlook on life. 8. Eased Transition to Assisted Living or Nursing Homes – Animal-assisted therapy can ease the transition to assisted living or nursing homes for elderly individuals. – The presence of animals in these environments can create a sense of familiarity, comfort, and homeliness, reducing anxiety and [stress](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/natural-health/how-peppermint-oil-can-help-ease-digestion-and-improve-stress/). 9. Improved Emotional Well-being – Interacting with animals has been shown to increase the production of oxytocin, a hormone associated with feelings of happiness and bonding. – Pets provide emotional [Support](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/donate-page/?utm_source=KL), unconditional love, and a source of comfort, improving overall emotional [well-being](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/news/sniffing-for-dogs-well-being/). 10. Enhanced Motivation and Overall Quality of Life – The presence of animals motivates elderly individuals to engage in activities, maintain routines, and take better care of themselves. – Animal-assisted therapy contributes to a higher quality of life, [fostering](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/news/cat-finally-gets-friend-after-fostering-dozens-others/) feelings of joy, purpose, and overall well-being. Animal-assisted therapy offers a multitude of benefits for elderly individuals, encompassing physical, emotional, and social aspects of their well-being. From reducing loneliness and depression to improving cognitive function and physical activity, the presence of animals has the power to transform the lives of seniors. By recognizing and incorporating animal companionship into eldercare programs, we can enhance the overall quality of life for older adults and promote their holistic well-being. [Animals Are My Favorite People by Tiny Rescue: Animal Collection](https://tinyrescue.org/sustainable-animal-rights-clothing/) [Click here to Support Us](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/donate-page/?tag=onegrepla-20) Related Content: [The Healing Power: 10 Benefits of Animal-Assisted Therapy for Children with Autism](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/animals/the-healing-power-10-benefits-of-animal-assisted-therapy-for-children-with-autism/) [The Power of Pet Therapy: 10 Animal-Assisted Activities for Healing and Well-being](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/animals/the-power-of-pet-therapy-10-animal-assisted-activities-for-healing-and-well-being/) [Florida Program Uses Farm Animals to Help Rehabilitate Inmates](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/news/florida-program-uses-farm-animals-to-help-rehabilitate-inmates/) [Paws for Healing: The Journey of a Therapy Cat-Human Amputee Duo](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/news/paws-for-healing-the-journey-of-a-therapy-cat-human-amputee-duo/) [Are Cats or Dogs Better Support Animals? This New Study Has an Answer!](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/news/are-cats-or-dogs-better-support-animals-this-new-study-has-an-answer/) Easy Ways to Help the Planet: - Eat Less Meat: Download [Food Monster](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/food-monster-vegan-recipes/id1052988561), the largest plant-based [Recipe app](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/food-monster-vegan-recipes/id1052988561/?utm_source=KL)on the App Store, to help reduce your environmental footprint, save animals and get healthy. You can also buy a hard or soft copy of our [favorite vegan cookbooks](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/vegancookbooks/). - Reduce Your Fast Fashion Footprint: Take initiative by standing up against fast fashion [Pollution](https://tinyrescue.org/sustainable-climate-change-clothing/?utm_source=KL)and supporting sustainable and circular brands like [Tiny Rescue](https://tinyrescue.org/)that raise awareness around important issues through recycled zero-waste clothing designed to be returned and remade over and over again. [Support](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/donate-page/?utm_source=KL)Independent Media: Being publicly funded gives us a greater chance to continue providing you with high-quality content. Please consider [supporting us](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/donate-page/)by donating! - Sign a Petition: Your voice matters! Help turn petitions into victories by signing the latest list of [must-sign petitions](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/tag/petitions/)to help people, animals, and the planet. - Stay Informed: Keep up with the latest news and important stories involving animals, the environment, sustainable living, food, health, and human interest topics by subscribing to [our newsletter](http://www.onegreenplanet.org/newsletter/)! - Do What You Can: Reduce waste, plant trees, eat local, travel responsibly, reuse stuff, say no to single-use plastics, recycle, vote smart, switch to cold water laundry, divest from fossil fuels, save water, shop wisely, [Donate](https://www.onegreenplanet.org/donate-page/?utm_source=KL)if you can, grow your food, volunteer, conserve energy, compost, and don’t forget about the microplastics and microbeads lurking in common household and personal care products!

author: La 100
title: Murió el artista plástico Luis Felipe Noé
text:
[Conmoción en el fútbol: murió Manga, el legendario arquero brasileño que hizo historia en Nacional de UruguayOpens in new window ]
En la tarde de este miércoles 9 de abril, se conoció la triste noticia del fallecimiento de Luis Felipe Noé, el reconocido artista plástico argentino a sus 91 años. Confirmaron la noticia de su muerte desde su fundación.
Mirá También: Murió el futbolista Jaime Ruiz en una dramática tragedia en pleno partido y el dolor es total
Murió Luis Felipe Noé, el reconocido artista plástico argentino
Desde la Fundación de Luis Felipe Noé confirmaron la muerte del reconocido artista plástico argentino. “Con profundo pesar, desde la Fundación Luis Felipe Noé informamos el fallecimiento de Luis Felipe Noé, artista fundamental cuya obra y pensamiento transformaron de manera profunda el arte argentino y latinoamericano”, expresaron en un comunicado.
Después, sumaron que destacaron del crítico su interés por la docencia y su rol de divulgador. “En 2019, con la lucidez y generosidad que lo caracterizaban, creó esta Fundación con el propósito de preservar y proyectar su legado. Celebramos su vida, su inagotable impulso creativo y su aguda mirada como una forma de comprender el mundo. Su legado perdura en cada obra, en cada palabra, en cada gesto que invitó a pensar y a crear”, dice el escrito.
“Desde la Fundación, agradecemos sus enseñanzas y la posibilidad de abrir este camino compartido, y reafirmamos nuestro compromiso con su pensamiento: seguiremos honrando su memoria en cada acción de nuestra existencia, porque en el hacer se vive y en el hacer se crece. En el transcurso del día informaremos en que lugar, día y horario lo velaremos”, cerraron en el comunicado de la Fundación.
Mirá También: Murió un bebé de 7 meses: su papá se lo olvidó en la bañadera mientras hablaba por teléfono
Quién fue Luis Felipe Noé, el gran artista plástico que fue clave para la Argentina
Luis Felipe Noé nació el 26 de mayo de 1933 en Buenos Aires. El escritor argentino y artista plástico integró la Asociación Amigos del Arte y dirigió la revista Nosotros que fue fundamental en la vida literaria porteña de principios del siglo XX.
Con más de 20 exposiciones individuales y colectivas, se destacó por ser uno de los intelectuales y un gran artífice para el arte argentino. Noé obtuvo una beca del gobierno francés y viajó a París con De la Vega; más tarde se unieron Macció y Deira y el grupo se consolidó.
Después del arte, se dedicó a la enseñanza, escribió libros y ensayos, fue curador y eventualmente retornó a las muestras, como la que hizo en el Museo Nacional de Bellas Artes en 2017.

author: veilid.com
title: v0.1.3 of bloc_advanced_tools
text:
bloc_advanced_tools 0.1.3 bloc_advanced_tools: ^0.1.3 copied to clipboard
Advanced tools for development using the BLoC pattern
Collection of useful tools for BLoC and Cubit development in Dart
[#](#collection-of-useful-tools-for-bloc-and-cubit-development-in-dart)
Tests are not complete
Contains
[#](#contains)
- AsyncTransformerCubit - Wrapper cubit that takes an input cubit and asynchronously transforms its state and produces a transformed output state.
- BlocBusyWrapper - Wrapper mixin adds 'busy state' processing to an input bloc or cubit, so you can tell if a cubit is performing a state-modifying operation.
- BlocMapCubit - Streaming container cubit that is a map from some immutable key to a some other cubit's output state.
- BlocToolsExtension - Extension methods to make common operations on blocs easier.
- FutureCubit - Simple base class for a cubit that initialized based on the result of a Future.
- StateMapFollower - Mixin that automatically keeps two blocs/cubits in sync with each other. Useful for having a BlocMapCubit 'follow' the state of another input cubit.
- StreamWrapperCubit - Simple base class to wrap a stream of states with a Cubit.
- TransformerCubit - Wrapper cubit that takes an input cubit and transforms its state and produces a transformed output state.
